column4: I have one but I'm still trying to figure out why my second hard drive has swap and boot partitions
swap is easy to remake.  /boot/ would only get made if you told it to. If your linux install is using  its own /boot/ then id say its a left over from some other install
you could image your linux install to a file. and use it as a vbox hard drive image ;) so you can still run it.
